title: Google's Saul Bass Animation – Title
content:
I'm curious whether the below is [from] a font or not:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816084337im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Google_SaulBass_5199.jpg)

author: hrant

comments.content:
Hello  
Maybe:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/DF-Hei-Std-HK-W9-Traditional-Chinese-OT.font?t...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816084337/http:/www.whatfontis.com/DF-Hei-Std-HK-W9-Traditional-Chinese-OT.font?text=GOOGLE "http://www.whatfontis.com/DF-Hei-Std-HK-W9-Traditional-Chinese-OT.font?text=GOOGLE")  
manual extended?  
Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816084337/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!
Looks like Univers Extended Bold to me, a bit stretched. Or may be an extended version of Roboto but I'm not aware of it...
